price: Nya Majini yakorera Sulayimani ivyo ashaka mu kwubaka imisigiti, no mu guhingura ibintu mu butare bw’umujumpu n’ubw’ikiyo, amabakuri maninimanini yagutse nk’icogo, inkono z’impange amahanga zitigera ziva aho zihinguriwe ku bunini bwazo. Ni ho rero Twavuga Duti: “Ewe muryango wa Dawudi! Nimukore mwubahiriza amabwirizwa yanje Jewe Allah mu ntumbero yo gushima inema zanje”. Burya rero, ni bake cane mu baja banje banshimira cane[3].
arabic: يَعۡمَلُونَ لَهُۥ مَا يَشَآءُ مِن مَّحَٰرِيبَ وَتَمَٰثِيلَ وَجِفَانٖ كَٱلۡجَوَابِ وَقُدُورٖ رَّاسِيَٰتٍۚ ٱعۡمَلُوٓاْ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكۡرٗاۚ وَقَلِيلٞ مِّنۡ عِبَادِيَ ٱلشَّكُورُ
footnotes: [3] Umuryango wa Dawudi rero, wari muri abo baja bake bashimira cane Imana Allah.

meta.transliteration: yaʿmalūna lahu mā yashāu min maḥārība watamāthīla wajifānin kal-jawābi waqudūrin rāsiyātin iʿ'malū āla dāwūda shuk'ran waqalīlun min ʿibādiya al-shakūru
